tasks.coverage: rm -rf ./cov && deno test --quiet --allow-net --allow-read --parallel --coverage=cov && deno coverage --detailed ./cov && rm -rf ./cov
tasks.coverage-list: rm -rf ./cov && deno test --quiet --allow-net --allow-read --parallel --coverage=cov && deno coverage ./cov && rm -rf ./cov
tasks.test: deno task test-circular-dependencies && deno task test-deploy
